mapper.insert: insert into review(num, title, u_id, content,origin,hotelname,rating,review_img) values (review_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{u_id}, #{content},review_seq.nextval,#{hotelname},#{rating},#{review_img})
insert into review(num, title, u_id, content,origin,hotelname,groupnum) values (review_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{u_id}, #{content},#{num},#{hotelname},1)
mapper.select: select num,title, u_id, content,TO_CHAR(writedate, 'YYYY/MM/DD')writedate, origin,groupnum,hotelname,rating,review_img from review where hotelname = #{hotelname} order by origin desc,groupnum asc
select num,title, u_id, content,TO_CHAR(writedate, 'YYYY/MM/DD')writedate, origin,groupnum,hotelname,rating,review_img from review where hotelname = #{hotelname} order by origin asc,groupnum asc
mapper.update: update review set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, rating = #{rating}, review_img = #{review_img} where num = #{num}
update review set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select rating numrating ,round(ratio_to_report(rating) over()*100,2) count from review where hotelname=#{hotelname} and not rating is null group by rating order by rating
